  --- Lynxiz ---

  Lynxiz rushes forward, foot long claws e=
xtended, bringing herself 
  into a battle rage as she prepares to defend h=
er firends and allies. 
  "NO," She yells, "I WILL NOT ALLOW YOU TO KILL HE=
R." She 
  growls audiable in fury, and slashes twice, once with her right =
set 
  of claws at the preoccupied Depp's shoulder, and slashes again 
  wi=
th her left arm at Depp's wrist holding the katana. 


  On 11 Jul 2001, at=
 6:29, airly2000@... wrote:

  >

red  5 shots against McGowan, 10 against Virgo and 5 against Alba.

d quickly and she fired 25 energy-balls against
